scripts.down: docker compose down && docker image prune -f && docker builder prune -f
scripts.db:migrate:apply: docker exec -it aichatbase_app npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:dev: docker exec -it aichatbase_app npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:reset: docker exec -it aichatbase_app npx prisma migrate reset --skip-seed
scripts.db:migrate:status: docker exec aichatbase_app npx prisma migrate status
scripts.db:migrate:prod: docker compose exec aichatbase_app npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec aichatbase_app npx prisma generate
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec aichatbase_app npx prisma studio
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec aichatbase_app npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:format: docker exec aichatbase_app npx prisma format
